document.full_text: stanley ho said he had reached an agreement with members of his family whom he had previously accused of robbing him of his stake in the business he built up over the past half a century.
document.title: macao casino tycoon says family dispute is over
lines_and_colors: stanley ho said he had reached an agreement with members of his family whom he had previously accused of robbing him of his stake in the business he built up over the past half a century.
